title: Hot Lava Floor
description: Hot Lava Floor is a parkour game that will remind you back to your childhood imagination. Run and jump onto various objects around you, but be careful, do not let your guard down or you will be drowning in the hot lava! Collect cash along the way to buy chests in the Lava Shop. Try to find keys while you do the parkour to be able to unlock new levels. Play it by yourself or even with your friends in multiplayer mode.
